review: I have been enjoying this Chromecast from day 1! It does the job as advertised from Google. Installation was seamless! All you need is to give access to your wireless network and Chromecast does the rest. Anybody with almost zero technical expertise can use it! Uses your wireless network to send signal from your mobile devices or computer/laptop so you can be in any room and cast your screen  in your television. If you install Google chrome in your computer and install Chromecast plugin for Google Chrome browser, you can share your computer screen via Chromecast to television. If you have mobile devices such as smart phone or tablets, you can send your media via YouTube, Google Video, Hulu, Netflix etc. only as advertised in Google Chromecast website.Enjoy Chromecasting!
